name: editify
author: Purab Singha Roy
description: Editify is a sleek and intuitive text editor designed for creators who value simplicity and efficiency. Whether you're drafting notes, coding, or writing your next masterpiece, Editify offers a seamless experience with its clean interface, powerful editing tools, and customizable features. With real-time collaboration, smart syntax highlighting, and a distraction-free mode, Editify helps you focus on what truly mattersâ€”your words. Ideal for writers, developers, and anyone who loves the art of text, Editify makes editing effortless and enjoyable.
